All Classes

Class Description
CurrentOrderController
The Current Order Controller displays the users order with prices.
CustomizeController
The Customize Controller class will be used to create the user's pizza.
Deluxe
The Deluxe sub class is where we create a Pizza of type Deluxe.
Hawaiian
The Hawaiian sub class is where we create a Pizza of type Hawaiian.
Main
The Main class will set the foundation for the root and scene and call the Controller class.
MainController
The Main Controller will open the other UIs based on user selection.
Order
The Order class is where we store the list of pizza orders based on user phone number.
Pepperoni
The Pepperoni sub class is where we create a Pizza of type Pepperoni.
Pizza
The Pizza abstract class will create the overall design for all the pizza types.
PizzaMaker
The Pizza Maker class makes an instance of pizza depending on type.
Size
Size specifies the size of the Pizza.
StoreOrderController
The Store Order class will be used to see final orders.
StoreOrders
The Store Order class is where we store the list of orders.
Topping
Topping specifies the Topping of the Pizza.
